DOC.brief_summary: The aims of this study are to (1) understand the uncertainty , personality and coping strategies in patients with HCC, and identify the significant factors for coping.
DOC.brief_title: The Illness of Uncertainty, Personality and Coping Strategies in Patients With Hepatocellular Carcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: A cross-sectional correlated design will be used and (2) patients will be recruited by purposive sampling from wards and outpatient departments at a medical center in Taipei.
DOC.criteria: Adult Has HCC and knows condition Con's clear Agree join the study e BCLC stage C or D Accepted C/T, R/T,target therapy or supportive care Patient who receive liver transplantation
